title: HTML+CSS Level 5 — Forms & Inputs
concept: Build basic forms with different input types.

challenges.title: Q1: Login Form
challenges.description: Create a simple login form with 'Email' and 'Password' fields and a 'Login' button. Use labels linked to the inputs.
challenges.outputDescription: A basic login form appears on the page.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Login Form</title>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Create your login form here -->
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Q2: Feedback Form
challenges.description: Create a feedback form with fields: Name (text), Email, Rating (1–5 using radio buttons), and a multi-line feedback box. Add a Submit button.
challenges.outputDescription: A feedback form with multiple input types.
examples: Group radio buttons with the same name attribute for rating.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Feedback Form</title>
</head>

    <!-- Build your feedback form here -->
</body>
</html>
